summary: This bill, H.R. 1378, proposes to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. It aims to extend the temporary increase in the limitation on the cover over of distilled spirits taxes to Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands. Specifically, it extends the sunset date for this tax provision from January 1, 2022, to January 1, 2032. The bill's provisions are to be applied to spirits brought into the United States after December 31, 2021.
